page.title: 20Hailsham Humanities Project.
page.content: Humanities is a 1st year course involving 5 departments:{English, {Geography, History, Social Studies and {R.E.}The syllabus contains both skills and content which cross-cut each other, and is firmly rooted in the local environment. Each department has its own syllabus which is coordinated thematically with the others, under the headings of{Self, {School, Family and Community.}Plenary sessions are organised and this term we have used the{Domesday Survey.} We normally use the local area this term and in doing so have been able to examine it from more than one angle,eg land use, historical change, facilities, social importance and how it reflects life past and present. Our pupils having already developed an awareness of inter-relationships have enjoyed and gained much from this work
